import math
how_many = int(raw_input())
for i in range(how_many):
    throw_away = raw_input()
    pie_weights = map(int,raw_input().split())
    rack_weights = map(int,raw_input().split())
    pie_weights.sort(reverse = True)
    rack_weights.sort(reverse = True)
    can_hold = 0
    #print pie_weights,rack_weights
    for pie in pie_weights:
        if pie <= rack_weights[0]:
            rack_weights.pop(0)
            can_hold += 1
    print can_hold
